member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.CountryCode
member.summary: Two letter country code. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.Month
member.summary: Month to plan holiday in. Optional parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.Year
member.summary: Year to plan holiday in. Optional parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.City
member.summary: City to plan holiday in. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.VisitingRadiusInMeter
member.summary: Radius limit for destination. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.DestinationKinds
member.summary: Kind of destinations preferred, comma separated. Optional.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HolidayPlanRequest.PreferredDestination
member.summary: Search for destination. Optional parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HotelSearchRequest.Keyword
member.summary: Hotel to search for. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HotelSearchRequest.CountryCode
member.summary: Two letter country code. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.HotelSearchRequest.Max
member.summary: Result limit. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.LocationDetailsRequest.Name
member.summary: Location to search for. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.LocationDetailsRequest.Country
member.summary: Two-letter country code to search for location. Optional parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.PublicHolidaysRequest.Country
member.summary: Two-letter country code, ISO-3166. A required field.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.PublicHolidaysRequest.Day
member.summary: The particular day for holiday. Optional.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.PublicHolidaysRequest.Month
member.summary: The particular month for holiday. Optional.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.PublicHolidaysRequest.Year
member.summary: The particular year for holidays. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.PublicHolidaysRequest.Location
member.summary: State of the mentioned country to get state-level holidays (iso-3166 format). Optional.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.Radius
member.summary: Radius to search within for location. Required parameter.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.Lat
member.summary: Latitude to search from. Optional if not known.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.Lon
member.summary: Longitude to search from. Optional if not known.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.CityDetails
member.summary: City details. Required parameter if lat long are not provided.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.Kinds
member.summary: Kind of destinations preferred, comma separated. Optional.

member.name: P:APIMatic.Hackathon.DTOs.TouristDestinationRequest.PreferredDestination
member.summary: Search for destination. Optional parameter.
